name: Sabotage - The Heist Game
description:
ATOM GameJam #2 için yapılmıştır.

Sabotage the heist game is a RPG game with various finals. Explore the bank with Ricardo. He is a selfish pscyho that wants to have all the money in the world. Help him in his operation.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

F - Kill

LMB

SPOILER

True Ending Gameplay:

TEAM MEMBERS

- Servet Gülnaroğlu:                            Coding and SFX                  
- Zeki 'BizoNelleme' Kuş:                 Assets and Scenario          
- Mehmet Duhan Yalçınkaya:        Map Design and Models
